attributes.additional_details: I think that it’s such an awful thing that is happening more and more and someone needs to do something. We can’t just sit here and let this keep happening
attributes.background: I think that the government need to make horse smuggling illegal as it is where horses and ponies are sent over to Europe to be killed all because the owners can’t be bothered to spend the money or time to look for a caring and loving owner

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Smuggling is the illegal transport of objects, so horse smuggling is already illegal.

If there is something specific you would like the Government to do to prevent horse smuggling we may be able to accept a petition requesting that.
